title: Graph the First Inequality
text: We must graph $$y \geq 3x-2$$. We make the line solid and shade above it since we have $$ \geq $$.\n##figure2.gif##

title: Graph the Second Inequality
text: We must graph $$y<-1$$ We make the line dashed and shade below it since we have <.\n##figure4.gif##

title: The solution is region where shading overlaps: Blue-red
